trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A workflow instance may be suspended in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance, or the workflow runtime engine may suspend the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]工作流程執行個體可能以三種方式之一暫止︰ 主機呼叫<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>活動可能會從叫用工作流程執行個體內或工作流程執行階段引擎可能暫止工作流程執行個體。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is suspended, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 暫停工作流程執行個體時，工作流程執行階段引擎引發<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The host may subscribe to this event by adding an event handler to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 主機可能會訂閱此事件加入事件處理常式至<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of why the workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 取得工作流程執行個體暫止原因的描述。

trans-unit.source: If the host suspends the workflow instance, it supplies a reason for the suspension in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果主機暫止工作流程執行個體，它會提供在暫止的原因`string`至<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>參數

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is suspended by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity, the reason is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果暫止的<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>活動，原因由<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>所提供</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>的工作流程

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the workflow runtime engine supplies a reason for the suspension.
trans-unit.target: 否則，工作流程執行階段引擎提供暫止的原因。

trans-unit.source: The description of why the workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體暫止的原因描述。
